posts.message:
Let's say I want to redesign gurustop.net
Not make a totally different design but extract brand colours and create a brand identity that I can build on later for other pages / websites
While on it, fix small glitches (like how the padding above title is not the same in all pages, etc) by having better structured WordPress theme files and CSS (possibly based on bootstrap).

Where would I go to get this at reasonable price (since I'm an individual running a family on single income, trying to squeeze this until I can create something profitable, and then invest more in it using profits)?

Well, what is a reasonable price anyway?

كل سنه وانتم طيبين
لو حد بيستخدم phonegap
في اقتراحات ل framework  او مكتبات كويسه عشان يساعد في ال UI خصوصا لل لعب 2D
والي بيستخدم phonegap بيستخدمه على Eclipse وﻻ ايه الافضل
